it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs

Class AbstractSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs.Plug<EV3.InputPort>
      • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs.AbstractSensor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GyroSensor, LightSensor, TouchSensor, UltrasonicSensor

    public abstract class AbstractSensor
extends Plug<EV3.InputPort>
    Abstract class for sensors collecting reusable functionalities.

    • Field Detail

      • type

        protected final int type
        This field represents the type of the direct command according to the EV3 Development Kit Documentation, e.g. Const.EV3_COLOR.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSensor

        protected AbstractSensor(@NonNull
                         EV3.Api api,
                         EV3.InputPort port,
                         int type)
        Create an instance of this class given an object of type EV3.Api, and input port and the type constant. This constructor is meant for subclasses specializing a specific sensor.
        Parameters:
        api - an object of type EV3.Api.
        port - input port where the sensor is attached to.
        type - type constant, e.g. Const.EV3_COLOR.

    • Method Detail

      • getPercent

        @NonNull
protected <T> java.util.concurrent.Future<T> getPercent(int mode,
                                                                  int nvalue,
                                                                  @NonNull
                                                                  Function<short[],T> f)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Send a PCT command and converts the reply by applying the given function.
        Type Parameters:
        T - generic type that is the generic argument of the resulting future.
        Parameters:
        mode - mode constant as defined in Const, e.g. Const.GYRO_ANGLE.
        nvalue - number of values for the reply.
        f - function object for converting the array of shorts into an object of type T.
        Returns:
        a future hosting an object of type T.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.

      • getPercent1

        @NonNull
protected <T> java.util.concurrent.Future<T> getPercent1(int mode,
                                                                   @NonNull
                                                                   Function<java.lang.Short,T> f)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Send a PCT command with 1 nvalue and converts the reply by applying the given function. Calling this method is like calling getPercent(int, int, Function) with parameter nvalue equal to 1.
        Type Parameters:
        T - generic type that is the generic argument of the resulting future.
        Parameters:
        mode - mode constant as defined in Const, e.g. Const.GYRO_ANGLE.
        f - function object for converting the array of shorts into an object of type T.
        Returns:
        a future hosting an object of type T.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.

      • getPercent1

        @NonNull
protected java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Short> getPercent1(int mode)
                                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Send a PCT command with 1 nvalue and returns the resulting short.
        Parameters:
        mode - mode constant as defined in Const, e.g. Const.GYRO_ANGLE.
        Returns:
        a future hosting a 16-bit short.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when communication errors occur.
